comment: WORST PROFESSOR EVER! I have never disliked a professor in my 4 yrs of college and I cannot stand him! I get As on papers, but in his class I can't get higher than a low B on his papers. He expects you do be flawless in writing and in understanding the material. No joke, he has unrealistic expectations. A lot of my classmates dropped the class
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Tough grader
